mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARDS ORDER BY board_seq ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDS (board_title, board_re_at, mem_id, board_content, board_at, board_img) VALUES (#{board_title}, NOW(), #{mem_id}, #{board_content}, NOW(), #{board_img})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARDS SET board_title = #{board_title}, board_re_at = #{board_re_at}, mem_id = #{mem_id}, board_content = #{board_content}, board_at = NOW(), board_img = #{board_img} WHERE board_seq = #{board_seq}
